sentences.en: "Elizabeth R", a TV portrait of the Queen, had record viewing figures.
sentences.cn: 关于女王的电视专题片《伊丽莎白女王》创下了收视纪录。

sentences.en: Alberg took the portrait down from the wall.
sentences.cn: 阿尔伯格从墙上摘下那幅肖像画。

sentences.en: He gives us a portrait of the real Gandhi, warts and all.
sentences.cn: 他向我们描绘了真正的甘地，包括他的不足。

sentences.en: He had his portrait painted in uniform.
sentences.cn: 他让人画了一幅身着制服的画像。

sentences.en: He was putting the finishing stroke to the portrait.
sentences.cn: 他给这幅画作最后的修饰.

sentences.en: Lucian Freud has been asked to paint a portrait of the Queen.
sentences.cn: 卢西恩·弗洛伊德已受邀为女王画肖像画。

sentences.en: She painted a beautiful portrait for us.
sentences.cn: 她为我们画了一幅漂亮的肖像.
她摆好姿势让人为她画肖像.

sentences.en: She’s been commissioned to paint Jackson’s portrait .
sentences.cn: 她已受托为杰克逊画肖像。

sentences.en: The art of portrait miniatures was originated in England.
sentences.cn: 微型画像艺术创始于英国.

sentences.en: The article gives a detailed portrait of a great soldier.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章详细地描写了一位伟大的战士.

sentences.en: The artist has reproduced your features very well in this portrait.
sentences.cn: 这位艺术家在这幅画像中把你的容貌重现得维妙维肖.

sentences.en: The portrait was touched up so as to make it lighter.
sentences.cn: 这张画经过润色,色调明朗了一些.

sentences.en: There is a portrait of King Charles on the wall.
sentences.cn: 墙上挂着查尔斯国王的画像.

sentences.en: What an accurate portrait — it's him to the life!
sentences.cn: 多准确的画像啊,酷似他本人!

words.tran_cn: 肖像画；肖像绘制；人像摄影
记述者；描画者；肖像画家

trans.tran_cn: 竖向的；纵向打印格式的
肖像，肖像画，模型，标本，半身雕塑像，人物描写
trans.tran_en: a painting, drawing, or photograph of a person
